entry.title: Derby Originals Kids Black Leather Show Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Gloves
Price: 4.95

Great for every use or outdoor activities in cold weather. Excellent for horse riding and shows!
Made of soft and breathable genuine leather with lycra side panels finger reinforcement. Velcro and elastic closure at the wrist to ensure snugness. A great glove for a great price.

Measure around your hand at the widest part, excluding the thumb. The number of inches should equal your glove size.

Sizes:
•Small (6-1/2" to 7") 

  •  Genuine leather with lycra side panels finger reinforcement
  •  Velcro and elastic closure at the wrist to ensure snugness
  •  Use to keep warm
  •  See size chart to select the right fit
  •  Popular for horse shows

entry.title: Heritage Pro-Flow Summer Show Riding Gloves Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 27.95

Events during summer can get really warm in show clothes. Heritage Gloves has developed this unique show glove for those hot days. This show glove is the first of its kind to be fully ventilated with a mesh top and air holes on the palm side of the glove.
  • Made from soft Cabretta sheepskin leather
  • Mesh top with air holes
  • Fully ventilated

Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 15.95

This very popular lightweight durable riding glove is made with our own special blend of stretchable nylon and LycraÂ® spandex. The PVC dots pattern palm design provides an excellent grip on the reins whether you are showing or pleasure riding.

  • Reinforced PVC dot pattern palm for excellent grip.

Perfect for riding on cold wet windy weather, these gloves are windproof and water resistant with a soft micro fiber finish and leather palm and finger reinforcement, thinsulate lined. High quality gloves at an affordable price.

entry.title: SSG All Weather Horse Riding Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: SSG
Type: Gloves
Price: 22.95

You'll find a multitude of uses for these comfortable and long wearing riding gloves... schooling, shows, hacking, dressage... These unlined, long wearing and machine washable gloves are made of soft Aquasuede plusÂ® palm. Colorfast and sweat absorbing with strong elasticized backs for a cool comfortable fit. Velcro wrist closure keeps them secure. Washes like a rag, wears like iron. Super stylish colors.

How to measure your glove size:
Measure around your hand at widest part, excluding thumb. The number of inches should equal your glove size.
  • Palms and fingers are constructed of Aquasuede PlusÂ®
  • Elasticized backs
  • Hook-and-loop wrist closures
  • Unlined, long wearing, colorfast and sweat absorbing machine washable
  • Glove size: Measure around your hand at widest part, excluding thumb. The number of inches should equal your glove size

entry.title: Heritage Performance Horse Riding Gloves Pink Plaid
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 27.95

Kids, as well as adult riders, love our fun and colorful print pattern Performance riding gloves. Soft and breathable fabrics and durable palm material make this an excellent choice riding glove for all year around. Same great features as our popular Performance Colors riding gloves.
  • Stretch Spandura® material provides a comfortable fit.
  • Super Grip® synthetic grain leather is breathable and increases grip on reins.
  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Double stitched critical outward seams.
  • Elastic cuff with adjustable strap.
  • Double layer thumb.
  • Personal I.D. Label.
  • Machine washable line dry – do not machine dry

entry.title: Heritage Pro-Flow Summer Show Riding Gloves Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage Gloves
Type: Gloves
Price: 27.95

We know that at some events during summer it can get really warm in show clothes waiting for your event to begin. That is why we have developed this unique show glove for those hot days. This show glove is the first of its kind to be fully ventilated with a mesh top and air holes on the palm side of the glove. This glove is made with the best grade of soft Cabretta sheepskin leather.

  • Stretchable Coolmax® Mesh top panel to allow free air flow.
  • Stretchable Coolmax® Nylon flex panels along fingers and hand provide a comfortable fit.
  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Double stitched critical outward seams.
  • Wrap around leather reinforced index finger.
  • Genuine Cabretta leather palm.
  • Elastic band strips hold glove securely in place.

entry.title: Heritage Spectrum Show Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 33.95

The Heritage Spectrum Show glove offers a comfortable custom fit with a stretchable flex panel across your knuckles and adjustable strap closure. This glove is also made with exclusive Heritage breathable "Spectrum Suede" synthetic suede leather to help increase your sensitivity control and grip of the reins. "Spectrum Suede" is designed to be breathable and permeate the perspiration from your skin out at the same time maintaining a perfect grip. This special material is also machine washable.

 

  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Breathable “Spectrum Suede” synthetic suede leather.
  • Double stitched critical outward seams.
  • Stretchable flex knuckle panels for comfortable fit.
  • Adjustable strap closure.

entry.title: Heritage Extreme Winter Horse Riding Gloves Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heritage
Type: Gloves
Price: 40.95

These gloves were designed for riding in the coldest weather possible. These may be the warmest riding gloves you'll ever wear. Made with all waterproof materials.

Our most popular waterproof winter riding glove just got even better. The Heritage Extreme Winter glove is already widely known as one of the best-selling winter gloves and is now “Touch Screen Friendly”. We have also improved the palm material to offer more grip and durability in wet or dry conditions. Also added is a glove clip to keep your gloves together when not in use.

  • Waterproof breathable liner.
  • Four barriers of protection and a warm comfortable fit to keep the cold, wet and wind out.
  • Stretch nylon Spandura® outer shell bonded to a waterproof inner membrane.
  • Doubled the insulation to 70 grams 3m Thinsulate for additional warmth.
  • Improved palm material for increased durability.
  • Patented Rein Cut™ design us patent number 7,281,275.
  • Inseamed construction means no exposed seams to the elements.
  • Long knit cuff with an elastic band.
  • Glove clip keeps your gloves together.

entry.title: SSG Windstopper Winter Riding Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: SSG
Type: Gloves
Price: 17.99

The SSG Windstopper is a perfect wind and water resistant breathable glove to be used for cold & windy day riding. The gloves are soft and comfortable like fleece, with skin tight fitting, allowing you to adjust your tack without taking off the gloves.
  • Wind and water resistant
  • Soft and comfortable like fleece with skin tight fitting
  • Allows the skin to breath
  • Small (5/6), Medium (7/8), Large (9/10), or X-Large (11)
